mapper.select: select userName from t_person where id = #{id}
select a.userName from t_test a JOIN t_person_0 b on a.userName = b.userName
select orderName from t_order where orderName = #{orderName} and createTime = #{startDate}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order(createTime, orderId, orderName) values(#{createTime}, 10, '1111');
